casebody.data:
UTILITIES COMM.
v.
ATTORNEY GENERAL. No. 196A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 12, 2006. Gary R. Govert, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Margaret A. Force, Assistant Attorney General, for Attorney General. James H. Jeffries, IV, Kim R. Cocklin, Senior Vice President, Charlotte, for Piedmont Natural Gas Co., et al. *92Gina C. Holt, Elizabeth D. Szafran, for Public Staff-Utilities Comm. James P. West, Raleigh, for Carolina Utilities Customers. Mary Lynne Grigg, Raleigh, Craig Collins, for Public Service Co. of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of May 2006 by Attorney General for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 21st day of July 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of May 2006."
